experiments.exp_objective: To develop a Multimodal Feature Distillation module that can handle incomplete modalities

exp_method.exp_method: Develop a neural network architecture incorporating a Multimodal Feature Distillation module. Test the module with datasets having varying degrees of modality completeness.

exp_merits.exp_merits: Enables effective brain tumor segmentation even when some imaging modalities are missing, potentially improving diagnostic accuracy and treatment planning.

experiments.exp_objective: To design a Unimodal Feature Enhancement module that can model the relationship between global and local information semantically

exp_method.exp_method: Implement a Unimodal Feature Enhancement module within a neural network. Evaluate its performance on segmenting brain tumors using metrics that assess the integration of global and local information.

exp_merits.exp_merits: Improves the semantic understanding of tumor regions by effectively integrating detailed local features with broader contextual information.

experiments.exp_objective: To propose a Cross-Modal Fusion module that can explicitly align the global correlations among different modalities

exp_method.exp_method: Create a Cross-Modal Fusion module and integrate it into a multimodal neural network. Test the network on multimodal datasets to assess alignment accuracy.

exp_merits.exp_merits: Enhances the accuracy of tumor segmentation by leveraging the strengths of each modality through effective global correlation alignment.
